name: Exploding Chickens (and a few penguins)
description:
It's Chicken vs. Chicken in this multiplayer action game! A controller is highly recommended, but you can also play with mouse and keyboard. (If you do, you'll have to use the keyboard for menus, sorry!) Also the browser version has some lag spikes and audio glitches, but if you can put up with that it mostly works. Download for the Best Experience™

Basic Controls (see in-game page for more details):

  • Left Stick (WASD) to move
  • Right Stick (Mouse) to aim
  • Left Trigger (Space) to fly
  • Right Trigger (Left Click) to shoot
  • Hold Right Bumper (Tab) to open Inventory
  • D-pad (Scroll Wheel) to select a weapon

Created in one week for the Missouri S&T GDC 2022 Fall Game Jam. I had a lot of ideas for this game that didn't make it in time, but I'm still super happy with the end result. This was my first time a designing (slightly) complex UI, so I learned a lot there! 

Credits:

  • Made in the Godot game engine
  • Destructible Terrain system was based on by demos by MatMerda (https://github.com/matterda/godot-destructible-terrain) and MrEliptik (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aBxk-n61SjM)
  • The player turn system was based on a tutorial by GDQuest
  • Music by Kevin Macleod
  • Fonts are Goudy Stout and Reggae One
